price: 41. »¡Pueblo mío!, ¿cómo puede ser que mientras que yo os llamo a la salvación vosotros me llaméis al fuego?
arabic: ۞ وَيَٰقَوۡمِ مَا لِيٓ أَدۡعُوكُمۡ إِلَى ٱلنَّجَوٰةِ وَتَدۡعُونَنِيٓ إِلَى ٱلنَّارِ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wayāqawmi mā lī adʿūkum ilā al-najati watadʿūnanī ilā al-nāri
